titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to establish a council to conduct a survey and analysis of the employment figures and demographics in the energy, energy efficiency, and motor vehicle sectors of the United States, and for other purposes.
Promoting American Energy Jobs Act of 2019

Promoting American Energy Jobs Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
